fixes.name: Not Selected Date
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type] <> SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As]),
    'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type],
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF that compares a row-level field to a Tableau parameter into DAX. Replaced [Type] with 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type] and [Parameters].[Date Type] with SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As]). Used IF(condition, value, BLANK()) to mimic Tableau's IF ... THEN ... END (no ELSE returns NULL).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
